entries.name: intro-ML-R
entries.author: Dereck de Mézquita
entries.displayName: Introduction to machine learning with R
entries.summary: What is machine learning? Simply put, it’s a set of statistical methods and data analysis that automates analytical model building.

entries.name: 102_introR
entries.author: Dereck de Mézquita
entries.summary: R studio is an IDE for using R. It is nicer and we can use it to save our projects. R is case sensitive and space sensitive. It's variables can be modified after declaration.

entries.name: intro-unix-shell
entries.author: Dereck de Mézquita
entries.summary: Operating system, windows, OSX is based on UNIX. The operating system manages memory and computing power (CPU, GPU), devices (screen, keyboard), and manages users. OSs allows us to run programmes and GUI.

entries.name: immunology
entries.author: Dereck de Mézquita
entries.summary: The immune system is responsible for three main functions in the human body. The definition of the self, the recognition of foreign signal molecules, and for the defence of the self.

entries.name: engineeringMicro
entries.author: Dereck de Mézquita
entries.summary: Welcome to this course. Here we'll cover the topic of manipulating and adapting microorganisms for our personal uses. Be it industrial or research. However this course does lean more towards the industrial scale, but can be used to produce other organisms of interest.

entries.name: introBiology
entries.author: Dereck de Mézquita
entries.summary: Polymers of DNA can be over billions of atoms in size. The first chromosome in humans for example is over 247 million base pairs long, and can contain over 15 billion atoms.

entries.name: introStatistics
entries.author: Dereck de Mézquita
entries.slogan: I like my coffee like my prime numbers!
entries.summary: This course is adapted from M1 Biotech course work. Thus it is very biology heavy and life science oriented. It will try to integrate bioinformatics techniques as often as possible so as not to have to do things by hand the old-fashioned way.
